q: If you need inspiration, don't do it.
h:
“If you need inspiration, don't do it.” —
Elon Musk

q: Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.
h:
“Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal

q: People inspire you, or they drain you. Pick them wisely.
h:
“People inspire you, or they drain you. Pick them wisely.” —
Les Brown

q: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
h:
“Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.” —
Thomas Edison

q: Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.
h:
“Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.” —
Ralph Marston

q: In life you need either inspiration or desperation.
h:
“In life you need either inspiration or desperation.” —
Tony Robbins

q: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and got to work.
h:
“Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and got to work.” —
Stephen King

q: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.
h:
“To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.” —
Criss Jami

q: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
h:
“Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.” —
Pablo Picasso

q: Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
h:
“Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.” —
Grace Coddington

q: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
h:
“You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club. ” —
Jack London

q: Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.
h:
“Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal

q: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.
h:
“If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.” —
Andrew Carnegie
